page.syntax: L flag email_send_low(C from_emailAddress ,C from_name ,C message_html ,C message_plaintext ,C message_subject ,C to_emailAddresses ,C user_name ,C password ,C smtp_address[,N port ])

argument.name: to_emailAddress
argument.description: The recipient's e-mail address. This can be a comma delimited list of addresses.

argument.name: user_name
argument.description: The user name of the sender's e-mail account.

argument.name: password
argument.description: The password of the sender's e-mail account.

argument.name: smtp_address
argument.description: The address of the SMTP server.

page.description: Send an email message without using a pre-configured email profile.
page.discussion:
Profiles are defined by selecting the View, Settings, E-mail command. However, there may be situations in which a profile has not been defined where this function is useful.
NOTE: To send an email using a Profile, use the email_send() function.
